titles.title: There's Within My Heart a Melody

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's within my heart a melody Jesus whispers sweet and low: Fear not, I am with thee, peace, be still, in all of life's ebb and flow.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, sweetest name I know, fills my every longing, keeps me singing as I go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All my life was wrecked by sin and strife, discord filled my heart with pain; Jesus swept across the broken strings, stirred the slumbering chords again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Feasting on the riches of his grace, resting neath his sheltering wing, always looking on his smiling face, that is why I shout and sing.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Though sometimes he leads through waters deep, trials fall across the way, though sometimes the path seems rough and steep, see his footprints all the way.

verse.name: v5
